General.Name: Power Generation Corp 3
General.Description: Power Generation Joint Stock Corporation 3 generates and distributes electricity in Vietnam. The company engages in the operation, maintenance, and management of gas, turbine, coal-fired, and hydroelectric power plants. It is also involved in the construction investment; and operation, management, maintenance, and repair of power plant equipment. In addition, the company provides training and human resource development services for operation and maintenance of power plants. Further, it offers consulting, design, and installation services for electrical and industrial projects, such as power plant, substation, and switchyard, as well as maintenance services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
